page.title: 12Wood Green Road.
page.content: In this square there are lots of houses and roads. The main road is {Wood Green Road}and it is a very busy road which carries traffic to and from the motorway. Next to the Wood Green Road is {Brunswick Park.}This is a large playing area with a paddling pool, football pitches, crazy golf course, tennis courts and a bowling green. Some of the problems in the park are caused by people letting dogs off their leads, the paintwork on the playground equipment is crumbling, the park keeper is not always there and because of that people fight and deface the buildings within the park. Over the other side of the park is a {railway}which carries goods from here to other parts of the country. The railway is not used by passengers.
